item.title: EP 254 - The Bigfoot Wears Prada: When Cryptids Wear Clothes
item.description:
Today we try to defuse an alien inspired bomb, check out low water level warnings with haunting messages, and go clothes shopping with Bigfoot!

MERCH STORE!!!

https://www.redbubble.com/people/deadrabbitradio/works/35749420-dead-rabbit-radio?asc=u

 

Help Promote Dead Rabbit!

Dual Flyer

https://i.imgur.com/OhuoI2v.jpg

"As Above" Flyer 

https://i.imgur.com/yobMtUp.jpg

 

Pennsylvania man allegedly built bomb to warn about aliens who plan to destroy planet

https://www.foxnews.com/us/man-bomb-aliens-destroy-planet

 

Authorities: Man built bomb to warn about alien threat

https://www.heraldmailmedia.com/news/nation/authorities-man-built-bomb-to-warn-about-alien-threat/article_8aa00c5b-e16f-5f43-a48d-588f02414313.html

 

PENNSYLVANIA CRIME CLASSIFICATION

https://www.davidcohenlawfirm.com/pennsylvania-crime-classification

 

Title 18

https://www.legis.state.pa.us/cfdocs/legis/LI/consCheck.cfm?txtType=HTM&ttl=18&div=0&chpt=27&sctn=16&subsctn=0

 

David Oxenreider Accused of Myerstown, PA Bomb Threat

https://heavy.com/news/2019/06/david-oxenrider/

 

Sinister 'Hunger Stones' With Dire Warnings Have Been Surfacing in Europe

https://www.sciencealert.com/sinister-hunger-stones-dire-warnings-surfacing-european-heatwave-czech-drought-elbe-decin

 

Hungerstein (water level mark)

https://de.wikipedia.org/wiki/Hungerstein_(Wasserstandsmarkierung)

 

When Bigfoot Gets Stylish

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2016/11/when-bigfoot-gets-stylish/

 

Random Reports of Bigfoot Wearing Clothes

https://cryptomundo.com/cryptozoo-news/bushman/

 

Further Accounts of Clothed Monsters

https://mysteriousuniverse.org/2018/01/further-accounts-of-clothed-monsters/

 

25th Anniversary Of Truly Scary Pennsylvania UFO Encounter

http://members.tripod.com/~task_2/Wave-Scary.htm

 

Listen to the daily podcast anywhere you listen to podcasts!

Opening Song: "Atlantis Attacks"

Closing Song: "Bella Royale"

Paranormal, Conspiracy, and True Crime news as it happens! Jason Carpenter breaks the stories they'll be talking about tomorrow, assuming the world doesn't end today.
